body_text:
I didn't know if using the autobind decorator on a base class would autobind methods on a class that inherits from it, and to which instance.
I just tested it, and it seems to only autobind the inherited method; methods that aren't on the base class, or overridden methods, do not appear to be autobound, so I'll fix this.
body:

I just tested it, and it seems to only autobind the inherited method; methods that aren't on the base class, or overridden methods, do not appear to be autobound, so I'll fix this.
